name: Haunt me Down
description:
This is a submission to the Jamming Assembly game jam !

----------------------------------

You're playing as a Soul, trying to escape Death. Fortunatly, you can possess wild animals to run as far as possible. Short puzzles, quick reflexes needed, you'll love being chased to (or by ?) Death.

ZQSD / WASD - Move
E - kill the animal you're possessing
Left clic - Change your animal in a certain radius
R - restart the level

Each animal has its own abilities ! Some are fast on ground and slow in water, others are great to destroy obstacles... You decide wich is the more approriate to run away from your fate !
